channel.title: Nanak on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Nanak on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] I made a module PyNanaco that can charge nanaco credit with python
item.description: # GitHub PyNanaco What is this You can use selenium to access the nanaco web page and log in/out, credit charge, and set/cancel your credit card. Up to 50,000 yen can be credited with one command. merit 50,000 yen can be charged in one operation, so it is easier than operating the web screen Work to set/release credit cards on multiple nanaco can be described in a few lines If linked with a separate cron or scheduler, nanaco charge and credit card settings can be changed by batch processing.
